meanings.definition: A substance or material that makes something tougher or more resilient.
meanings.sent1: The toughener added to the paint made it more durable.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a toughener to strengthen the metal.
meanings.sent3: The toughener in the glue made the broken vase as good as new.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement acted as a toughener for his confidence.
meanings.sent5: The toughener in the fabric made it resistant to tears.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that strengthens or fortifies.
meanings.sent1: The coach was a toughener for the team, pushing them to do their best.
meanings.sent2: Eating healthy food can be a toughener for your immune system.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear became a toughener for the little girl's courage.
meanings.sent4: His kind words served as a toughener for her resolve.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse acted as a toughener for the sailors, guiding them safely.
